metadata.Title: CVE-2019-16276 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
Go before 1.12.10 and 1.13.x before 1.13.1 allow HTTP Request Smuggling.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-16276` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

golang-1.13 - 1.13.1-1ubuntu1
golang-1.13-go - 1.13.1-1ubuntu1
golang-1.13-src - 1.13.1-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: golang-1.13 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.13.1-1ubuntu1').
